name: Change, Please: Beg Simulator
description:
Step into the role of tiny, cube folk living life on the streets.

A kind passerby may help you with some spare change, items or food (if lucky).

While, the police may help you with a huge fine, or prison (if unlucky).

The challenges ahead will be long, lonely and tough for most people.

But never forgot. All you'll need is... Change, Please!
